Name: Turtwig
PkdxEntry: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.

Name: Grotle
PkdxEntry: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

Name: Torterra
PkdxEntry: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

Name: Chimchar
PkdxEntry: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.

Name: Monferno
PkdxEntry: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.

Name: Infernape
PkdxEntry: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.

Name: Piplup
PkdxEntry: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

Name: Prinplup
PkdxEntry: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

Name: Empoleon
PkdxEntry: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

Name: Starly
PkdxEntry: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.

Name: Staravia
PkdxEntry: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stays within a huge flock.

Name: Staraptor
PkdxEntry: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.

Name: Bidoof
PkdxEntry: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

Name: Bibarel
PkdxEntry: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

Name: Kricketot
PkdxEntry: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.

Name: Kricketune
PkdxEntry: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

Name: Shinx
PkdxEntry: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

Name: Luxio
PkdxEntry: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.

Name: Luxray
PkdxEntry: It has eyes that can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.

Name: Budew
PkdxEntry: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

Name: Roserade
PkdxEntry: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.

Name: Cranidos
PkdxEntry: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.

Name: Rampardos
PkdxEntry: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.

Name: Shieldon
PkdxEntry: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.

Name: Bastiodon
PkdxEntry: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

Name: Burmy
PkdxEntry: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

Name: Burmy
PkdxEntry: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

Name: Burmy
PkdxEntry: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

Name: Wormadam
PkdxEntry: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

Name: Wormadam
PkdxEntry: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

Name: Wormadam
PkdxEntry: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

Name: Mothim
PkdxEntry: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by COMBEE.

Name: Combee
PkdxEntry: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

Name: Vespiquen
PkdxEntry: When endangered, grubs from its six-cell honeycomb strike back. There is only one in a colony.

Name: Pachirisu
PkdxEntry: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

Name: Buizel
PkdxEntry: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.

Name: Floatzel
PkdxEntry: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

Name: Cherubi
PkdxEntry: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.

Name: Cherrim
PkdxEntry: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.

Name: Shellos
PkdxEntry: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.

Name: Shellos
PkdxEntry: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.

Name: Gastrodon
PkdxEntry: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

Name: Gastrodon
PkdxEntry: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

Name: Ambipom
PkdxEntry: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

Name: Drifloon
PkdxEntry: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

Name: Drifblim
PkdxEntry: It’s drowzy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

Name: Buneary
PkdxEntry: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.

Name: Lopunny
PkdxEntry: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.

Name: Mismagius
PkdxEntry: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.

Name: Honchkrow
PkdxEntry: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous MURKROW in tow.

Name: Glameow
PkdxEntry: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

Name: Purugly
PkdxEntry: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon’s nest and claims it as its own.

Name: Chingling
PkdxEntry: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.

Name: Stunky
PkdxEntry: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

Name: Skuntank
PkdxEntry: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

Name: Bronzor
PkdxEntry: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

Name: Bronzong
PkdxEntry: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

Name: Bonsly
PkdxEntry: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body’s fluid levels by eliminating excess.

Name: Mime Jr.
PkdxEntry: t habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

Name: Happiny
PkdxEntry: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.

Name: Chatot
PkdxEntry: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

Name: Spiritomb
PkdxEntry: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

Name: Gible
PkdxEntry: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

Name: Gabite
PkdxEntry: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.

Name: Garchomp
PkdxEntry: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

Name: Munchlax
PkdxEntry: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.

Name: Riolu
PkdxEntry: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

Name: Lucario
PkdxEntry: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.

Name: Hippopotas
PkdxEntry: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

Name: Hippowdon
PkdxEntry: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

Name: Skorupi
PkdxEntry: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

Name: Drapion
PkdxEntry: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

Name: Croagunk
PkdxEntry: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

Name: Toxicroak
PkdxEntry: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

Name: Carnivine
PkdxEntry: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

Name: Finneon
PkdxEntry: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.

Name: Lumineon
PkdxEntry: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.

Name: Mantyke
PkdxEntry: A friendly Pokémon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.

Name: Snover
PkdxEntry: It lives on snowy mountains. Having had little contact with humans, it is boldly inquisitive.

Name: Abomasnow
PkdxEntry: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. It is the abominable snowman.

Name: Weavile
PkdxEntry: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.

Name: Magnezone
PkdxEntry: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.

Name: Lickilicky
PkdxEntry: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

Name: Rhyperior
PkdxEntry: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

Name: Tangrowth
PkdxEntry: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

Name: Electivire
PkdxEntry: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

Name: Magmortar
PkdxEntry: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

Name: Togekiss
PkdxEntry: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.

Name: Yanmega
PkdxEntry: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.

Name: Leafeon
PkdxEntry: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.

Name: Glaceon
PkdxEntry: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.

Name: Gliscor
PkdxEntry: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

Name: Mamoswine
PkdxEntry: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

Name: Porygon-Z
PkdxEntry: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.

Name: Gallade
PkdxEntry: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

Name: Probopass
PkdxEntry: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

Name: Dusknoir
PkdxEntry: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

Name: Froslass
PkdxEntry: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

Name: Rotom
PkdxEntry: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

Name: Rotom
PkdxEntry: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

Name: Rotom
PkdxEntry: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

Name: Rotom
PkdxEntry: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

Name: Rotom
PkdxEntry: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

Name: Rotom
PkdxEntry: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

Name: Uxie
PkdxEntry: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

Name: Mesprit
PkdxEntry: Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

Name: Azelf
PkdxEntry: Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

Name: Dialga
PkdxEntry: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

Name: Palkia
PkdxEntry: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

Name: Heatran
PkdxEntry: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

Name: Regigigas
PkdxEntry: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

Name: Giratina
PkdxEntry: A Pokémon that is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours. It appears in an ancient cemetery.

Name: Cresselia
PkdxEntry: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

Name: Phione
PkdxEntry: A Pokémon that lives in warm seas. It inflates the flotation sac on its head to drift and search for food.

Name: Manaphy
PkdxEntry: Born on a cold seafloor, it will swim great distances to return to its birthplace.

Name: Darkrai
PkdxEntry: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

Name: Shaymin
PkdxEntry: It lives in flower patches and avoids detection by curling up to look like a flowering plant.

Name: Arceus
PkdxEntry: It is described in mythology as the Pokémon that shaped the universe with its 1,000 arms.
